How does one SYNC the subtitles to the movie?  I was able to add the subtitles with Submerge, but they were not at all synchronized.  What is the trick to sync the subs to the movie?
@gerdsperd: Make sure the title of the subs is exactly the same as the title of the movie. You can make this happen by cut-and-paste. Note: this only works with .srt-files
Very GOOD movie. Copy is very good too. Worth the wait of download. Subtitle is as good as the film.
